mapper.select: SELECT BOARD.BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , CONTENT , BOARD_DATE , BOARD.USER_CODE , USERS.USER_NAME , BOARD_CNT FROM BOARD INNER JOIN USERS ON BOARD.USER_CODE = USERS.USER_CODE WHERE BOARD_TYPE = '31' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD.BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , CONTENT , BOARD_DATE , BOARD.USER_CODE , USERS.USER_NAME , BOARD_CNT FROM BOARD INNER JOIN USERS ON BOARD.USER_CODE = USERS.USER_CODE WHERE BOARD_TYPE = '32' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD.BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_DATE , BOARD_CNT , CONTENT , UPLOAD_ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM BOARD INNER JOIN UPLOADFILE ON BOARD.BOARD_NO = UPLOADFILE.BOARD_NO WHERE BOARD.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT COUNT (BOARD_NO) FROM BOARD inner join users ON board.USER_CODE = users.USER_CODE
where ${searchType} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue} , '%')
